text: 8|63|anta nampikkaiyāḷarkaḷuṭaiya uḷḷaṅkaḷil (islāmiṉ mūlam) aṉpai ūṭṭi (citaṟikkiṭanta avarkaḷai) oṉṟu cērttāṉ. Pūmiyiluḷḷa aṉaittaiyum nīr celavu ceytapōtilum avarkaḷuṭaiya uḷḷaṅkaḷil aṉpaiyūṭṭa um'māl muṭiyātu. Eṉiṉum, allāhtāṉ avarkaḷai (aṉpiṉ mūlam) oṉṟu cērttāṉ. Niccayamāka avaṉ (aṉaittaiyum) mikaittavaṉ, ñāṉamuṭaiyavaṉ
